name: vine wind
description:
Welcome to my Brackeys Game Jam 2020 Submission!

Controls:

W or UP - Climb up rope
S or DOWN - Slide down rope
D or RIGHT - Move/Swing right
A or LEFT - Move/Swing left
Q - Change direction on rope
CLICK - Select a pulley
R - Wind up selected pulley
F - Unwind selected pulley
SPACE - Release from rope

The jam theme was "rewind" and instead of going the "time" route, I decided that I wanted to make a game using winding ropes and pulleys.

This game has 6 levels so it's nice and short. Play as a hungry little caterpillar and eat up all of the tasty golden leaves you can.

The art and code is by me (Julia!) and the lovely music is by my friend Jesse Klein

You can see & support Jesse's work here:

I'll have a devlog video on how I made this game coming soon!
Thanks a bunch and hope you enjoy the game! <3
